00151 void EnterInitAimArchives()
00152 {
00153       gfDrawPopUpBox=FALSE;
00154       gfDestroyPopUpBox = FALSE;
00155

00161 BOOLEAN EnterAimArchives()
00162 {
00163   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00164       UINT16      usPosX, i;
00165 
00166 
00167       gfExitingAimArchives = FALSE;
00168 //    gubDrawOldMerc = 255;
00169       gfDrawPopUpBox=FALSE;
00170       gfDestroyPopUpBox=FALSE;
00171 
00172       InitAimDefaults();
00173       InitAimMenuBar();
00174 
00175       gubPageNum = (UINT8)giCurrentSubPage;
00176 
00177       // load the Alumni Frame and add it
00178       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00179       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\AlumniFrame.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00180       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiAlumniFrame));
00181 
00182       // load the 1st set of faces and add it
00183       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00184       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\Old_Aim.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00185       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiOldAim));
00186 
00187       // load the Bottom Buttons graphic and add it
00188       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00189       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\BottomButton.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00190       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiPageButtons));
00191 
00192       // load the PopupPic graphic and add it
00193       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00194       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\PopupPicFrame.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00195       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiPopUpPic));
00196 
00197             // load the AlumniPopUp graphic and add it
00198       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00199       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\AlumniPopUp.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00200       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiAlumniPopUp));
00201 
00202             // load the Done Button graphic and add it
00203       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00204       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\DoneButton.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00205       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiDoneButton));
00206 
00207       InitAlumniFaceRegions();
00208 
00209       //Load graphic for buttons
00210       guiAlumniPageButtonImage =  LoadButtonImage("LAPTOP\\BottomButtons2.sti", -1,0,-1,1,-1 );
00211 
00212       usPosX = AIM_ALUMNI_PAGE1_X;
00213       for(i=0; i<3; i++)
00214       {
00215             guiAlumniPageButton[i] = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiAlumniPageButtonImage, AimAlumniText[i], AIM_ALUMNI_PAGE_FONT, 
00216                                                                                      AIM_ALUMNI_PAGE_COLOR_UP, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00217                                                                                      AIM_ALUMNI_PAGE_COLOR_DOWN, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00218                                                                                      TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00219                                                                                      usPosX, AIM_ALUMNI_PAGE1_Y, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00220                                                                                      DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnAlumniPageButtonCallback);
00221             SetButtonCursor(guiAlumniPageButton[i], CURSOR_WWW);
00222             MSYS_SetBtnUserData( guiAlumniPageButton[i], 0, i);
00223 
00224             usPosX += AIM_ALUMNI_PAGE_GAP;
00225       }
00226 
00227       DisableAimArchiveButton();
00228       RenderAimArchives();
00229       return(TRUE);
00230 }
00231 
00232 void ExitAimArchives()
00233 {
00234       UINT16 i;
00235 
00236       gfExitingAimArchives = TRUE;
00237 
00238       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiAlumniFrame);
00239       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiOldAim);
00240       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiAlumniPopUp);
00241       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiPopUpPic);
00242       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiDoneButton);
00243 
00244 
00245       RemoveAimAlumniFaceRegion();
00246 
00247       UnloadButtonImage( guiAlumniPageButtonImage );
00248       for(i=0; i<3; i++)
00249             RemoveButton( guiAlumniPageButton[i] );
00250 
00251       RemoveAimDefaults();
00252       ExitAimMenuBar();
00253       giCurrentSubPage = gubPageNum;
00254 
00255       CreateDestroyDoneMouseRegion(0);
00256       gfDestroyPopUpBox = FALSE;
00257       gfDrawPopUpBox = FALSE;
00258 }

00260 void HandleAimArchives()
00261 {
00262       if( gfReDrawScreen )
00263       {
00264 //          RenderAimArchives();
00265             fPausedReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
00266 
00267             gfReDrawScreen = FALSE;
00268       }
00269       if( gfDestroyPopUpBox )
00270       {
00271             gfDestroyPopUpBox = FALSE;
00272 
00273             CreateDestroyDoneMouseRegion(0);
00274             InitAlumniFaceRegions();
00275             gfDestroyPopUpBox = FALSE;
00276       }
00277 }
00278 
00279 void RenderAimArchives()
00280 {
00281       HVOBJECT    hFrameHandle;
00282       HVOBJECT    hFaceHandle;
00283 //  HVOBJECT      hBottomButtonHandle;
00284       UINT16            usPosX, usPosY,x,y,i=0;
00285       UINT8             ubNumRows=0;
00286       UINT32                  uiStartLoc=0;
00287       wchar_t                 sText[400];
00288 
00289       
00290       DrawAimDefaults();
00291       DisableAimButton();
00292 
00293       //Draw Link Title
00294       DrawTextToScreen(AimAlumniText[AIM_ALUMNI_ALUMNI], AIM_ALUMNI_TITLE_X, AIM_ALUMNI_TITLE_Y, AIM_ALUMNI_TITLE_WIDTH, AIM_ALUMNI_TITLE_FONT, AIM_ALUMNI_TITLE_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00295 
00296       //Draw the mug shot border and face
00297       GetVideoObject(&hFrameHandle, guiAlumniFrame);
00298       GetVideoObject(&hFaceHandle, guiOldAim);
00299 
00300       switch(gubPageNum)
00301       {
00302             case 0:
00303                   ubNumRows = AIM_ALUMNI_NUM_FACE_ROWS;
00304                   i=0;
00305                   break;
00306             case 1:
00307                   ubNumRows = AIM_ALUMNI_NUM_FACE_ROWS;
00308                   i=20;
00309                   break;
00310             case 2:
00311                   ubNumRows = 2;
00312                   i=40;
00313                   break;
00314             default:
00315                   Assert(0);
00316                   break;
00317       }
00318 
00319       usPosX = AIM_ALUMNI_START_GRID_X;
00320       usPosY = AIM_ALUMNI_START_GRID_Y;
00321       for(y=0; y<ubNumRows; y++)
00322       {
00323             for(x=0; x<AIM_ALUMNI_NUM_FACE_COLS; x++)
00324             {
00325                   //Blt face to screen
00326                   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hFaceHandle, i,usPosX+4, usPosY+4, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00327       
00328                   //Blt the alumni frame background
00329                   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hFrameHandle, 0,usPosX, usPosY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00330 
00331                   //Display the merc's name
00332                   uiStartLoc = AIM_ALUMNI_NAME_LINESIZE * i;
00333                   LoadEncryptedDataFromFile(AIM_ALUMNI_NAME_FILE, sText, uiStartLoc, AIM_ALUMNI_NAME_SIZE );
00334                   DrawTextToScreen(sText, (UINT16)(usPosX + AIM_ALUMNI_NAME_OFFSET_X), (UINT16)(usPosY + AIM_ALUMNI_NAME_OFFSET_Y), AIM_ALUMNI_NAME_WIDTH, AIM_ALUMNI_NAME_FONT, AIM_ALUMNI_NAME_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED    );
00335             
00336                   usPosX += AIM_ALUMNI_GRID_OFFSET_X;
00337                   i++;
00338             }
00339             usPosX = AIM_ALUMNI_START_GRID_X;
00340             usPosY += AIM_ALUMNI_GRID_OFFSET_Y;
00341       }
00342 
00343       //the 3rd page now has an additional row with 1 merc on it, so add a new row
00344       if( gubPageNum == 2 )
00345       {
00346             //Blt face to screen
00347             BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hFaceHandle, i,usPosX+4, usPosY+4, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00348 
00349             //Blt the alumni frame background
00350             BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hFrameHandle, 0,usPosX, usPosY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00351 
00352             //Display the merc's name
00353             uiStartLoc = AIM_ALUMNI_NAME_LINESIZE * i;
00354             LoadEncryptedDataFromFile(AIM_ALUMNI_NAME_FILE, sText, uiStartLoc, AIM_ALUMNI_NAME_SIZE );
00355             DrawTextToScreen(sText, (UINT16)(usPosX + AIM_ALUMNI_NAME_OFFSET_X), (UINT16)(usPosY + AIM_ALUMNI_NAME_OFFSET_Y), AIM_ALUMNI_NAME_WIDTH, AIM_ALUMNI_NAME_FONT, AIM_ALUMNI_NAME_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED    );                
00356       
00357             usPosX += AIM_ALUMNI_GRID_OFFSET_X;
00358       }
00359 
00360 
00361 
00362 
00363 //    GetVideoObject(&hBottomButtonHandle, guiPageButtons);
00364       usPosX = AIM_ALUMNI_PAGE1_X;
00365 
00366       if( gfDrawPopUpBox )
00367       {
00368             DisplayAlumniOldMercPopUp();
00369             RemoveAimAlumniFaceRegion();
00370       }
00371 
00372 
00373   MarkButtonsDirty( );
00374 
00375       RenderWWWProgramTitleBar( );
00376   
00377       InvalidateRegion(LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y,LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_LR_Y);
00378 }

00383 
00384 void SelectAlumniFaceRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
00385 {
00386       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
00387       {
00388       }
00389       else if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
00390       {
00391             gfDrawPopUpBox = TRUE;
00392             gfReDrawScreen = TRUE;
00393 
00394             gubDrawOldMerc = (UINT8)MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
00395       }
00396       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
00397       {
00398       } 
00399 }
00400 
00401 
00402 void BtnAlumniPageButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00403 {
00404       UINT8 ubRetValue = (UINT8)MSYS_GetBtnUserData( btn, 0 );
00405       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00406       {
00407             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00408 
00409             gunAlumniButtonDown=ubRetValue;
00410             
00411             InvalidateRegion(AIM_ALUMNI_PAGE1_X,AIM_ALUMNI_PAGE1_Y, AIM_ALUMNI_PAGE_END_X,AIM_ALUMNI_PAGE_END_Y);
00412       }
00413       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00414       {
00415             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00416             {
00417                   btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00418 
00419                   RemoveAimAlumniFaceRegion();
00420 
00421                   ChangingAimArchiveSubPage( ubRetValue );
00422 
00423                   gubPageNum = ubRetValue;
00424                   
00425                   gfReDrawScreen = TRUE;
00426 
00427                   gfDestroyPopUpBox = TRUE;
00428 
00429                   gunAlumniButtonDown=255;
00430                   ResetAimArchiveButtons();
00431                   DisableAimArchiveButton();
00432                   gfDrawPopUpBox = FALSE;
00433 
00434                   InvalidateRegion(AIM_ALUMNI_PAGE1_X,AIM_ALUMNI_PAGE1_Y, AIM_ALUMNI_PAGE_END_X,AIM_ALUMNI_PAGE_END_Y);
00435             }
00436       }
00437       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
00438       {
00439             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00440             gunAlumniButtonDown=255;
00441             DisableAimArchiveButton();
00442             InvalidateRegion(AIM_ALUMNI_PAGE1_X,AIM_ALUMNI_PAGE1_Y, AIM_ALUMNI_PAGE_END_X,AIM_ALUMNI_PAGE_END_Y);
00443       }
00444 } 
00445 
00446 
00447 void ResetAimArchiveButtons()
00448 {
00449       int i=0;
00450 
00451       for(i=0; i<3; i++)
00452       {
00453             ButtonList[ guiAlumniPageButton[i] ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON; 
00454       }
00455 }
00456 
00457 
00458 void DisableAimArchiveButton()
00459 {
00460       if( gfExitingAimArchives == TRUE)
00461             return;
00462 
00463       if( (gubPageNum == 0 ) )
00464       {
00465             ButtonList[ guiAlumniPageButton[ 0 ] ]->uiFlags |= (BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00466       }
00467       else if( gubPageNum == 1 )
00468       {
00469             ButtonList[ guiAlumniPageButton[ 1 ] ]->uiFlags |= (BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00470       }
00471       else if( gubPageNum == 2 )
00472       {
00473             ButtonList[ guiAlumniPageButton[ 2 ] ]->uiFlags |= (BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00474       }
00475 }

00477 
00478 void DisplayAlumniOldMercPopUp()
00479 {
00480       UINT8             i,ubNumLines=11; //17
00481       UINT16            usPosY, usTextPosY;
00482       UINT8             ubFontHeight, ubNumDescLines;
00483       HVOBJECT    hAlumniPopUpHandle;
00484       HVOBJECT    hDoneHandle;
00485       HVOBJECT    hFacePaneHandle;
00486       HVOBJECT    hFaceHandle;
00487 //    WRAPPED_STRING *pFirstWrappedString, *pTempWrappedString;
00488       UINT16      usHeight = GetFontHeight(AIM_ALUMNI_POPUP_FONT);
00489       wchar_t     sName[AIM_ALUMNI_NAME_SIZE];
00490       wchar_t     sDesc[AIM_ALUMNI_DECRIPTION_SIZE];
00491       UINT32            uiStartLoc;
00492       UINT16      usStringPixLength;
00493 
00494       GetVideoObject(&hAlumniPopUpHandle, guiAlumniPopUp);
00495       GetVideoObject(&hDoneHandle, guiDoneButton);
00496       GetVideoObject(&hFacePaneHandle, guiPopUpPic);
00497       GetVideoObject(&hFaceHandle, guiOldAim);
00498 
00499       ubFontHeight = (UINT8)GetFontHeight(AIM_ALUMNI_POPUP_FONT);
00500 
00501       //Load the description
00502       uiStartLoc = AIM_ALUMNI_FILE_RECORD_SIZE * gubDrawOldMerc + AIM_ALUMNI_FULL_NAME_SIZE;
00503       LoadEncryptedDataFromFile(AIM_ALUMNI_FILE, sDesc, uiStartLoc, AIM_ALUMNI_DECRIPTION_SIZE);
00504 
00505       usStringPixLength = StringPixLength( sDesc, AIM_ALUMNI_POPUP_FONT);
00506       ubNumDescLines = (UINT8) (usStringPixLength / AIM_POPUP_TEXT_WIDTH); 
00507 
00508       ubNumLines += ubNumDescLines;
00509 
00510       usTextPosY = AIM_POPUP_Y + 5;
00511       usPosY = AIM_POPUP_Y;
00512 
00513       //draw top line of the popup background
00514       ShadowVideoSurfaceRect( FRAME_BUFFER, AIM_POPUP_X+AIM_POPUP_SHADOW_GAP, usPosY+AIM_POPUP_SHADOW_GAP, AIM_POPUP_X + AIM_POPUP_WIDTH+AIM_POPUP_SHADOW_GAP, usPosY + AIM_POPUP_SECTION_HEIGHT+AIM_POPUP_SHADOW_GAP-1);
00515       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hAlumniPopUpHandle, 0,AIM_POPUP_X, usPosY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00516       //draw mid section of the popup background
00517       usPosY += AIM_POPUP_SECTION_HEIGHT;
00518       for(i=0; i<ubNumLines; i++)
00519       {
00520             ShadowVideoSurfaceRect( FRAME_BUFFER, AIM_POPUP_X+AIM_POPUP_SHADOW_GAP, usPosY+AIM_POPUP_SHADOW_GAP, AIM_POPUP_X + AIM_POPUP_WIDTH+AIM_POPUP_SHADOW_GAP, usPosY + AIM_POPUP_SECTION_HEIGHT+AIM_POPUP_SHADOW_GAP-1);
00521             BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hAlumniPopUpHandle, 1,AIM_POPUP_X, usPosY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00522             usPosY += AIM_POPUP_SECTION_HEIGHT;
00523       }
00524       //draw the bottom line and done button
00525       ShadowVideoSurfaceRect( FRAME_BUFFER, AIM_POPUP_X+AIM_POPUP_SHADOW_GAP, usPosY+AIM_POPUP_SHADOW_GAP, AIM_POPUP_X + AIM_POPUP_WIDTH+AIM_POPUP_SHADOW_GAP, usPosY + AIM_POPUP_SECTION_HEIGHT+AIM_POPUP_SHADOW_GAP-1);
00526       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hAlumniPopUpHandle, 2,AIM_POPUP_X, usPosY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00527       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hDoneHandle, 0,AIM_ALUMNI_DONE_X, usPosY-AIM_ALUMNI_DONE_HEIGHT, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00528       DrawTextToScreen(AimAlumniText[AIM_ALUMNI_DONE], (UINT16)(AIM_ALUMNI_DONE_X+1), (UINT16)(usPosY-AIM_ALUMNI_DONE_HEIGHT+3), AIM_ALUMNI_DONE_WIDTH, AIM_ALUMNI_POPUP_NAME_FONT, AIM_ALUMNI_POPUP_NAME_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00529 
00530       CreateDestroyDoneMouseRegion(usPosY);
00531 
00532       ///blt face panale and the mecs fce
00533       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hFacePaneHandle, 0,AIM_ALUMNI_FACE_PANEL_X, AIM_ALUMNI_FACE_PANEL_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00534       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hFaceHandle, gubDrawOldMerc, AIM_ALUMNI_FACE_PANEL_X+1, AIM_ALUMNI_FACE_PANEL_Y+1, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00535 
00536       //Load and display the name
00537 //    uiStartLoc = AIM_ALUMNI_NAME_SIZE * gubDrawOldMerc;
00538 //    LoadEncryptedDataFromFile(AIM_ALUMNI_NAME_FILE, sName, uiStartLoc, AIM_ALUMNI_NAME_SIZE);
00539       uiStartLoc = AIM_ALUMNI_FILE_RECORD_SIZE * gubDrawOldMerc;
00540       LoadEncryptedDataFromFile( AIM_ALUMNI_FILE, sName, uiStartLoc, AIM_ALUMNI_FULL_NAME_SIZE );
00541 
00542       DrawTextToScreen(sName, AIM_ALUMNI_POPUP_NAME_X, AIM_ALUMNI_POPUP_NAME_Y, 0, AIM_ALUMNI_POPUP_NAME_FONT, AIM_ALUMNI_POPUP_NAME_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
00543 
00544       //Display the description
00545       DisplayWrappedString(AIM_ALUMNI_POPUP_DESC_X, AIM_ALUMNI_POPUP_DESC_Y, AIM_POPUP_TEXT_WIDTH, 2, AIM_ALUMNI_POPUP_FONT, AIM_ALUMNI_POPUP_COLOR, sDesc, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
00546   
00547       InvalidateRegion(LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y,LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_LR_Y);
00548 }

00551 void DestroyPopUpBox()
00552 {
00553       gfDestroyPopUpBox = FALSE;
00554       RenderAimArchives();
00555 }

00559 void InitAlumniFaceRegions()
00560 {
00561       UINT16      usPosX, usPosY,i,x,y, usNumRows;
00562 
00563       if(gfFaceMouseRegionsActive)
00564             return;
00565 
00566       if( gubPageNum == 2 )
00567             usNumRows = 2;
00568       else
00569             usNumRows = AIM_ALUMNI_NUM_FACE_ROWS;
00570 
00571       usPosX = AIM_ALUMNI_START_GRID_X;
00572       usPosY = AIM_ALUMNI_START_GRID_Y;
00573       i=0;
00574       for(y=0; y<usNumRows; y++)
00575       {
00576             for(x=0; x<AIM_ALUMNI_NUM_FACE_COLS; x++)
00577             {
00578 
00579                   MSYS_DefineRegion( &gMercAlumniFaceMouseRegions[ i ], usPosX, usPosY, (INT16)(usPosX + AIM_ALUMNI_ALUMNI_FACE_WIDTH), (INT16)(usPosY + AIM_ALUMNI_ALUMNI_FACE_HEIGHT), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00580                                                  CURSOR_WWW, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SelectAlumniFaceRegionCallBack); 
00581                   // Add region
00582                   MSYS_AddRegion( &gMercAlumniFaceMouseRegions[ i ] );
00583                   MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gMercAlumniFaceMouseRegions[ i ], 0, i+(20*gubPageNum));
00584 
00585                   usPosX += AIM_ALUMNI_GRID_OFFSET_X;
00586                   i++;
00587             }
00588             usPosX = AIM_ALUMNI_START_GRID_X;
00589             usPosY += AIM_ALUMNI_GRID_OFFSET_Y;
00590       }
00591 
00592       //the 3rd page now has an additional row with 1 merc on it, so add a new row
00593       if( gubPageNum == 2 )
00594       {
00595                   MSYS_DefineRegion( &gMercAlumniFaceMouseRegions[ i ], usPosX, usPosY, (INT16)(usPosX + AIM_ALUMNI_ALUMNI_FACE_WIDTH), (INT16)(usPosY + AIM_ALUMNI_ALUMNI_FACE_HEIGHT), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00596                                                  CURSOR_WWW, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SelectAlumniFaceRegionCallBack); 
00597                   // Add region
00598                   MSYS_AddRegion( &gMercAlumniFaceMouseRegions[ i ] );
00599                   MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gMercAlumniFaceMouseRegions[ i ], 0, i+(20*gubPageNum));
00600       }
00601 
00602 
00603 
00604       gfFaceMouseRegionsActive = TRUE;
00605 }
00606 
00607 void RemoveAimAlumniFaceRegion()
00608 {
00609       UINT16 i;
00610       UINT16 usNumber=0;
00611 
00612       if(!gfFaceMouseRegionsActive)
00613             return;
00614 
00615       switch(gubPageNum)
00616       {
00617             case 0:
00618                   usNumber = AIM_ALUMNI_NUM_FACE_ROWS * AIM_ALUMNI_NUM_FACE_COLS;
00619                   break;
00620             case 1:
00621                   usNumber = AIM_ALUMNI_NUM_FACE_ROWS * AIM_ALUMNI_NUM_FACE_COLS;
00622                   break;
00623             case 2:
00624                   usNumber = 2 * AIM_ALUMNI_NUM_FACE_COLS + 1;
00625 
00626             default:
00627                   break;
00628       }
00629 
00630       for(i=0; i<usNumber; i++)
00631       {
00632         MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gMercAlumniFaceMouseRegions[ i ]);
00633       }
00634       gfFaceMouseRegionsActive = FALSE;
00635 }
00636 
00637 
00638 
00639 
00640 void CreateDestroyDoneMouseRegion(UINT16 usPosY)
00641 {
00642       static BOOLEAN DoneRegionCreated=FALSE;
00643 
00644       if( ( !DoneRegionCreated ) && ( usPosY != 0) )
00645       {
00646             usPosY -= AIM_ALUMNI_DONE_HEIGHT;
00647             MSYS_DefineRegion( &gDoneRegion, AIM_ALUMNI_DONE_X-2, usPosY, (AIM_ALUMNI_DONE_X-2 + AIM_ALUMNI_DONE_WIDTH), (INT16)(usPosY + AIM_ALUMNI_DONE_HEIGHT), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00648                                            CURSOR_WWW, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SelectAlumniDoneRegionCallBack); 
00649             // Add region
00650             MSYS_AddRegion( &gDoneRegion );
00651             DoneRegionCreated = TRUE;
00652       }
00653 
00654       if( DoneRegionCreated && usPosY == 0)
00655       {
00656             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gDoneRegion );
00657             DoneRegionCreated = FALSE;
00658 //          gfDestroyDoneRegion = FALSE;
00659       }
00660 }
00661 
00662 
00663 void SelectAlumniDoneRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
00664 {
00665       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
00666       {
00667       }
00668       else if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
00669       {
00670             gfDestroyPopUpBox = TRUE;
00671             gfDrawPopUpBox = FALSE;
00672             gfReDrawScreen = TRUE;
00673       }
00674       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
00675       {
00676       } 
00677 }
00678 
00679 void ChangingAimArchiveSubPage( UINT8 ubSubPageNumber )
00680 {
00681       fLoadPendingFlag = TRUE;
00682 
00683       if( AimArchivesSubPagesVisitedFlag[ ubSubPageNumber ] == FALSE )
00684       {
00685             fConnectingToSubPage = TRUE;
00686             fFastLoadFlag = FALSE;
00687 
00688             AimArchivesSubPagesVisitedFlag[ ubSubPageNumber ] = TRUE;
00689       }
00690       else
00691       {
00692             fConnectingToSubPage = TRUE;
00693             fFastLoadFlag = TRUE;
00694       }
00695 }
